post.body: is on the market for more patience cuz she has officially lost ALL of hers.
FIGHT ON USC!
thinks this is pretty cool: http://video.yahoo.com/watch/2183321/6912105
is seriously considering flying trapeze classes: http://www.trapezearts.com/
is watching a program about a girl with sirenomelia (Mermaid Girl) on TLC. I just wanted to say sirenomelia...
has been thinking about doing laundry for 2 days now...
is enjoying conversing with my patient about his memories of the Battle of the Bulge. He likes me so much he says I'm a bonus. :P
and for you iPhone dorks, you can track Santa too: http://www.earthscape.com/iphone/santa.html
RAD...NoradSanta in 3D on Google Earth: http://www.noradsanta.org/en/track3d.html
I suppose working is a way of insuring not overeating this year. I wish that worked with overspending. Merrykelikiwanzanukah everyone.
Wants to go ice skating...
Wants to know what it is about the holidays that brings the idiot outta people.
Boys that I like, don't like me. Boys that like me, I don't like them. If I didn't have such an aversion to vag, I'd be a lesbian. Discuss?
just finished watching "Seven Years in Tibet."
Is grateful for having a purpose, for her awareness of it, and ability to live it. Love.
has just learned ants like wheat grass...ok universe, I'd be far more grateful without the ant infestation...
's mantra...vagina, vagina, vagina...boys r dumb, boys r dumb, boys r dumb...
wondering if anyone else thinks Obama needs a Barack-mobile remniscent of the Pope's. Or better yet, the Pope's?
Impressed w/ GW's reflexes. He must be used to having things thrown at him. Good job secret service.
Is amused at how people are dressed for an impending snowstorm
